title: gharrison
author: gharrison
created_time: June 02, 2023, 12:12:57 AMLast edit: June 03, 2023, 10:15:51 PM by gharrison
content: Come and join with us - Arsa Core of ARSAGILITYArsagility is an innovative blockchain system, allowing anyone with internet access to receive or make payments to anyone and anywhere in the world. The network is built upon Smartnodes as the governing hubs and Proof of Work as a validation method. There is no need for special equipment and central authority is nonexistent. Arsagility is secure, private and instant.BlockChain Properties:Coin Name: ARSAGILITYCore Name : Arsa CoreCoin Symbol: ARGYReward : 5000 ARGYBlock time: 120 secondsPoW algorithm: GhostRiderMax Supply: 21,000,000,000Port : 13232Reward distribution:90% Miner – 10% Development fee.  until the smartnode block is reached After Block #4320 Reward distribution:70% Smartnodes - 20% Miner - 10% Dev feeWe apologize to miners, with this update we speed up start of smartnodes in block #4320No premine - No ICO - Fair POW launchwhat we do is not necessarily the same as the othersGithub: https://github.com/arsa-hub/arsaWebsites: https://arsagility.org/Explorer: https://explorer.arsagility.orgDiscords: https://discord.gg/rBaDfKGJYxFollow Our Twitter and Get Somethingtwitter : https://twitter.com/arsacoreDownload QT Wallethttps://github.com/arsa-hub/arsa/releases/latestMining Pool :mining4people.comCode: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://fi.mining4people.com:3411 -u YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -p xaltcoinpool.ru :Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://ru-stratum.altcoinpool.ru:7173 -u YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -p xmr-miner.org :Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://stratum.mr-miner.org:4733 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=ARGYcminer.org :Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://stratum.cminer.org:3726 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=ARGYevepool.pwCode:-a gr -o stratum+tcp://mine.evepool.pw:7058 -u YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -p x

comments.author: mr-miner
comments.body: https://mr-miner.org/ has successfully added Arsagility (ARGY)Join now!Fees Share/Solo: 0.5%Min Payout: 1 ARGYDIscord: https://discord.gg/CAsyyqFpjQPaymentintervall every 30 minsMiner command line:-a gr -o stratum+tcp://stratum.mr-miner.org:4733 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=ARGYCheers!

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Arsagility (ARGY) to http://zpool.ca/algo/ghostrider. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine ghostrider and get paid in ARGY:Code:-a ghostrider -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zpool.ca:5354 -u ARGY_ADDRESS -p c=ARGY,zap=ARGY All of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for ghostrider: 55354==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.body: https://pool.coin-miners.info/site/gomining?algo=gr ARSAGILITY has been added to CoinMiners Mining PoolFee: 0.5%Payouts are made automatically every 1 hour for all balances above 0.01, or 0.001 on Sunday.Stratum settings:Code: xmrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6517 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=ARGYCode: wildrig.exe -a gr -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:6517 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=ARGYCode: SRBMiner-MULTI.exe --algorithm ghostrider --pool eu.coin-miners.info:6517 --wallet WALLET_ADDRESS --password  c=ARGYIf you want to mine solo add m=solo to the password like this Code:-p c=ARGY,m=soloDiscord channel https://discord.gg/szzvMEBNje

comments.author: sebit27
comments.body: Hum something strange to give a red flag.Mining started on 29th may, but already 1500 members on your discord server.Announce on bitcointalk yesterday morning....

comments.body: Quote from: sebit27 on June 03, 2023, 06:55:28 AMHum something strange to give a red flag.Mining started on 29th may, but already 1500 members on your discord server.Announce on bitcointalk yesterday morning....Just another trash RTM fork with no real goals. Also 20% miner reward. Yeah, about that..

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: well, we are already in 2023, and not many alts with this concept have survived. once listed in exchange, usually the project slowly dies down. checking the website, the content is very generic. nothing outstanding in my opinion.once those top holders discard their coins in the exchanges (once listed), i don't think this will last long. just my thoughts here.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on June 08, 2023, 09:30:48 PMwell, we are already in 2023, and not many alts with this concept have survived. once listed in exchange, usually the project slowly dies down. checking the website, the content is very generic. nothing outstanding in my opinion.once those top holders discard their coins in the exchanges (once listed), i don't think this will last long. just my thoughts here.I'm glad you and the previous two members are voicing skepticism with this project, and you're all spot-on with what you wrote.  This coin's creator didn't even bother to employ brand new alt accounts to bump the thread!  That surprises me, actually.  I'm not sure what's up with all of these cookie cutter coins using the ghostrider algo, but there's nothing innovative about any of them and the descriptions given in the ANN threads all look the same.And wouldn't you know they've all got that nice, fat 10-20% dev taxation included in the block reward distribution.  You know there's not going to be any fuckin' development.

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on October 06, 2023, 09:45:43 AMQuote from: AmoreJaz on June 08, 2023, 09:30:48 PMwell, we are already in 2023, and not many alts with this concept have survived. once listed in exchange, usually the project slowly dies down. checking the website, the content is very generic. nothing outstanding in my opinion.once those top holders discard their coins in the exchanges (once listed), i don't think this will last long. just my thoughts here.I'm glad you and the previous two members are voicing skepticism with this project, and you're all spot-on with what you wrote.  This coin's creator didn't even bother to employ brand new alt accounts to bump the thread!  That surprises me, actually.  I'm not sure what's up with all of these cookie cutter coins using the ghostrider algo, but there's nothing innovative about any of them and the descriptions given in the ANN threads all look the same.I found something shady with this project, it seemed they were just copying and pasting parts of other articles.Source: https://www.sig.id/en/Source: https://github.com/NeoxaChain/NeoxaSome of the GitHub projects are similar to the one above, it seems like this project has become commonplace and is starting to be copied over and over again.https://github.com/babacoinbbc/babacoinhttps://github.com/merciproject/mercihttps://github.com/jagoanpilot/jagoancoinhttps://github.com/VolkshashDEV/volkshashcorehttps://github.com/monacoinproject/monacoin
